main.intro: This is a viewer for the Planetary Data System of NASA JPL.

help.about_text_1: This application is a an explorer-like application intended for browsing the
help.about_text_4: Browsing the PDS is also possible by just using a web browser but due to the responses taking relatively long, it's not very comfortable.
help.about_text_5: This application aims to solve this by caching each response which makes revisiting folders and images much faster because there is actually no request to the PDS unless the requested resource is not yet cached, or the "reload" button is pressed.

nav.logo_alt: A world emoji, the logo of this application.

folder.error_fetching: There was an error fetching data from the API!
folder.bad_response_for_path: Bad response from server for path: '

file.error_parsing_json: Error parsing as JSON, using text...
file.error_loading_file: There was an error loading the requested file!

error_fetching.1: There was an error fetching the image.

image.bad_response: Bad response from server for image: '
